item.title: Milestone Years of Service recognition – Ryan White
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Please join me in congratulating Ryan White for reaching a milestone with his 10 years of service with UC. He worked at the Northern Regional Library Facility (NRLF) for eight years before coming to UCSF in 2016 as our Borrowing Coordinator. He has been invited to attend UCSF’s milestone recognition ...

Read moreMilestone Years of Service recognition – Ryan White

item.title: Irene Lau – Retirement
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
I regretfully announce that Irene Lau’s last day with UCSF Library is today as she is retiring.  As much as we would have loved to, we are unable to have a going-away party due to a recent death in her family. Irene has been one of those exceptional employees who ...

Read moreIrene Lau – Retirement

item.title: Congratulations to Eric!
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description: Please join me in congratulating Eric Peterson for reaching milestone with his 15 years of service to UCSF. He has been been invited to attend UCSF’s annual milestone recognition event in August, Andy Panado Access Services Manager

item.title: Milestone Years of Service – Access Services
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Please join me in congratulating the following Access Services staff in reaching a career milestone in years of service with UCSF (occurring in the calendar year 2016): Irene Lau – 10 years (July 2016) Tyrone McCloskey – 15 years (February 2016) Art Townsend – 15 years (February 2016) Mark Zanandrea ...

item.title: Congratulations to Irene Lau!
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Charlie Macquarie nominated Irene for a Thank a Colleague Award for her assistance with an archives project.  Although she doesn’t normally work with the Archives & Special Collections team, Irene enthusiastically pitched in and helped with obtaining all the UCSF website URLs off a public list, and compiled them into ...

Read moreCongratulations to Irene Lau!

item.title: Welcome Ryan White!
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Hello. In the last two weeks, you probably have seen a new face at the Service Desk, and that would be our new hire, Ryan White! Ryan has recently joined Access Services to fill our Interlibrary Services Borrowing Coordinator position, which has been vacant for over a year since Azar ...

Read moreWelcome Ryan White!

item.title: Andy’s recent trip to Northern England & Scotland
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Hello! As some of you know, I just returned from a fun-filled 3-week vacation to Northern England and Scotland.  Rather than sending some library staff pictures of my travel, I thought that my husband’s blog post (from his ever-expanding blog site, Furrowed Middlebrow) does better justice.  In it, he sums ...

Read moreAndy’s recent trip to Northern England & Scotland

item.title: Open Position: Borrowing Coordinator/Information Assistant
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
As many of you know, Azar Khatibi retired last June after 40 years of service as the Borrowing Coordinator.  The Access Services Unit has just posted the Borrowing Coordinator/Information Assistant position. For the full description, please see http://tinyurl.com/j7dxgg4, and feel free to pass on the information to anyone you think might ...

Read moreOpen Position: Borrowing Coordinator/Information Assistant

item.title: Quincy McCrary – off to NDNU!
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Quincy McCrary has accepted a position at the Notre Dame De Namur University (located in Belmont) as their new Academic Technology and Instruction Librarian. A key and valuable member of the Access Services Unit since 2006, Quincy has been the Day Supervisor assisting with the daily operations– from ensuring that ...

Read moreQuincy McCrary – off to NDNU!

item.title: Paws for a Break!
item.dc:creator: Andres Panado
item.description:
Happy Friday everyone! The library is again partnering with the Student Activity Center for the upcoming June finals. From 2pm-4pm on June 3rd, June 5th, June 10th and June 12th, we will have a dog visiting from the Animal Assisted Therapy at SPCA for students to pet. June 3rd – ...
